msbt.message: I try to put a lot of research and thought into choosing a style of decor for my home, . Hopefully that comes across and it doesn't look like I just threw a bunch of random stuff around
At home by myself, I'm happiest with a good, long book and some to drink.
I wish I had some treats to offer you. I probably should have made in advance
I wish I'd done a better job cleaning before having anyone over like this, ! Please don't look too closely at anything or tell anyone if you find dust under my furniture!
I like entertaining at home, but Sometimes I worry that I might be boring my guests, .I hope you feel comfortable enough to tell me if you're not having fun.
I'm so excited to be hosting some of my favorite neighbors here in my own home. What a rare treat!, am I overdoing it?I really don't want to sound like I'm all desperate or something
Having such good friends stop by to visit makes me glad that I'm living here on !
If only I'd known I was going to have company drop by like this I could have made !
Look at all the company I have! Not sure how I attracted so many fun guests, but I'm excited!
Having guests drop by like this makes me really glad I spent all day yesterday cleaning up!
Next time a crowd like this shows up, I'm going to recruit taste testers for my latest recipe!
